name: Alchemy Simulator 2022
description:
Learn the rules of alchemy by experimentation, and figure out the right ingredients to combine to make different products.

Created for Thinky Puzzle Jam 2.

Art from opengameart.org: (upscaled/recolored by me in some cases)

  • Farming Crops 16x16 by josehzz
  • Magic - Pixel Art by peony
  • amanita muscaria by Xevin
  • Explosion by Sogomm
